formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SayDigits' =-
[Synopsis] Say Digits
[Description] SayDigits(digits): This application will play the sounds that correspond to the digits of the given number. This will use the language that is currently set for the channel. See the LANGUAGE function for more information on setting the language for the channel.
